Description: A broad field of computer science focused on creating machines that can perform tasks that typically require human intelligence.
A subset of AI that enables computers to learn and improve from experience without being explicitly programmed.
A type of machine learning based on artificial neural networks with representation learning.
A subfield of AI that focuses on the interaction between computers and humans through natural language.
A field of AI that trains computers to interpret and understand visual information from the world.
A type of machine learning where an agent learns to make decisions by interacting with an environment.
AI systems that can generate new content, such as text, images, or music, based on training data.
The branch of AI dealing with the design, construction, and operation of robots.
AI programs that simulate the judgment and behavior of a human expert in a specific field.
Computing systems inspired by the biological neural networks that constitute animal brains.
